trans-unit.source: The indexes in the cache refer to the number of positions the item is from the first item appended into the cache. That is to say a cache with a capacity of 100, that has had 150 items appended will have a valid index range of 50 to 149. This allows inserting and retrieving items into the cache based on a theoretical infinite list
trans-unit.target: 缓存中的索引指的是该项目距离第一个被添加到缓存中的项目的位置数。也就是说,一个容量为100的缓存,如果添加了150个项目,那么有效的索引范围是50到149。这就允许基于理论上的无限列表来插入和检索项目到缓存中。

trans-unit.source: The information within a document can be accessed via two complementary interfaces: A cursor-based interface is used for editing, and a read-only hierarchical interface provides a high level overview of the document structure. The main advantage of the cursor-based interface is that the text can be edited using operations that mimic a user's interaction with an editor, without losing the underlying structure of the document. The read-only hierarchical interface is most useful when performing operations such as searching and document export.
trans-unit.target: 一个文档中的信息可以通过两个互补的界面来访问。基于光标的界面用于编辑,而只读的分层界面则提供文件结构的高层概览。基于光标的界面的主要优点是,可以使用模拟用户与编辑器交互的操作来编辑文本,而不会丢失文档的基本结构。在执行搜索和文档导出等操作时,只读层次界面是最有用的。

trans-unit.source: The informative text that provides a fuller description for the message.
trans-unit.target: 翔实的文字,对信息进行了更充分的描述。

trans-unit.source: The initial camera state, with camera not loaded. The camera capabilities, except supported capture modes, are unknown. While the supported settings are unknown in this state, it's allowed to set the camera capture settings like codec, resolution, or frame rate.

The initial camera state, with the camera not loaded. The camera capabilities (with the exception of supported capture modes) are unknown. This state saves the most power, but takes the longest time to be ready for capture.

trans-unit.source: The initial camera state, with the camera not loaded. The camera capabilities (with the exception of supported capture modes) are unknown. This state saves the most power, but takes the longest time to be ready for capture. While the supported settings are unknown in this state, you can still set the camera capture settings like codec, resolution, or frame rate.
The initial camera status, with camera not loaded. The camera capabilities including supported capture settings may be unknown.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机的初始状态,摄像机未加载。包括支持的拍摄设置在内的相机功能可能是未知的。

trans-unit.source: The initial distribution of size between the widgets is determined by multiplying the initial size with the stretch factor. You can also use setSizes() to set the sizes of all the widgets. The function sizes() returns the sizes set by the user. Alternatively, you can save and restore the sizes of the widgets from a QByteArray using saveState() and restoreState() respectively.
trans-unit.target: 小部件之间大小的初始分布是通过将初始大小乘以拉伸因子来确定的。您还可以使用setSizes（）设置所有小部件的大小。函数size（）返回用户设置的大小。另外，您可以分别使用saveState（）和restoreState（）从QByteArray保存和恢复小部件的大小。

trans-unit.source: The input context is used by the keyboard as well as concrete input methods. InputContext is a singleton instance hosted by QML. An application should not directly interact with the input context.
trans-unit.target: 输入上下文由键盘以及具体的输入方法使用。InputContext是QML托管的单例实例。应用程序不应直接与输入上下文进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The input context provides access to contextual information that originates from the application. This information includes, but is not limited to:

trans-unit.target: 输入背景;

trans-unit.source: The input engine also includes the default input method, which takes care of default processing if the active input method does not handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 输入引擎还包括默认输入法,如果主动输入法没有处理事件,则由默认输入法负责处理。

trans-unit.source: The input engine is responsible for routing input events to input methods. The actual input logic is implemented by the input methods.
trans-unit.target: 输入引擎负责将输入事件路由到输入方法。实际的输入逻辑是由输入方法来实现的。

trans-unit.source: The input engine object is owned by InputContext. Like the InputContext, there is only one instance of the QVirtualKeyboardInputEngine. The input engine contains API functions which the keyboard uses to map user interactions, such as key press and release events, to the input method.
trans-unit.target: 输入引擎对象归InputContext拥有。像InputContext一样，只有QVirtualKeyboardInputEngine的一个实例。输入引擎包含API函数，键盘使用这些函数将用户交互（例如按键和释放事件）映射到输入方法。

trans-unit.source: The input engine.
trans-unit.target: 输入引擎。

trans-unit.source: The input framework makes it easy to write custom input methods or to integrate 3rd party input engines. The input methods can be implemented in C++ or QML.
trans-unit.target: 输入框架可以很容易地编写自定义的输入方法或集成第三方输入引擎。输入方法可以用C++或QML实现。

trans-unit.source: The input framework provides the following main interfaces:
trans-unit.target: 输入框架提供以下主要接口:

trans-unit.source: The input mask is an input template string. It can contain the following elements:

The input method can collect as many traces as it sees fit and it can begin processing them when necessary. The processing can even be performed in parallel while sampling the data, although it is not recommended because of the potential performance issues. The recommended way is to start processing in a background thread after a suitable delay from the last input, so that the processing does not affect negatively to the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 输入法可以收集它认为合适的痕迹,它可以在必要时开始处理这些痕迹。甚至可以在对数据进行采样的同时进行并行处理,不过由于潜在的性能问题,不建议这样做。推荐的方法是在距离最后一次输入有适当的延迟后,在后台线程中开始处理,这样处理不会对用户界面产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: The input method can either be set separately for each keyboard layout, or commonly at this context. If set separately, then this property should not be modified.
trans-unit.target: 输入法可以为每个键盘布局单独设置,也可以在此上下文中共同设置。如果单独设置,那么这个属性就不应该被修改。

trans-unit.source: The input method does not participate in the actual collection of trace data. However, the input method has full control over the input since it can either accept or reject a QVirtualKeyboardTrace (e.g. if there are too many instances to handle). This also allows for precise control over how many fingers can be used simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 输入方法不参与跟踪数据的实际收集。但是，输入法可以完全接受输入，因为它可以接受或拒绝QVirtualKeyboardTrace（例如，要处理的实例过多）。这也允许精确控制可以同时使用多少个手指。

trans-unit.target: 当选择列表的内容发生变化时,输入法发出该信号。在输入法中,当选择列表的内容发生变化时,输入法会发出这个信号。

trans-unit.source: The input method instance can be created in various ways, depending on the use case:
trans-unit.target: 输入方法实例可以根据使用情况以多种方式创建。

trans-unit.source: The input method is a concrete implementation of the keypress handler. It's main function is to handle keypress events and maintain state information for the user input. It interacts with the text editor through QVirtualKeyboardInputContext via pre-edit text or key events.
trans-unit.target: 输入法是按键处理程序的具体实现。它的主要功能是处理按键事件并维护状态信息以供用户输入。它通过预编辑文本或键事件通过QVirtualKeyboardInputContext与文本编辑器进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The input method may request the input engine to update the selection lists at any time by emitting selectionListsChanged() signal. This signal will trigger a call to this method, allowing the input method to update the selection list types.
trans-unit.target: 输入方法可以通过发出selectionListsChanged（）信号随时请求输入引擎更新选择列表。该信号将触发对此方法的调用，从而允许输入方法更新选择列表类型。

trans-unit.source: The input method may request the input engine to update the selection lists at any time by emitting selectionListsChanged() signal. This signal will trigger a call to this method, allowing the input method to update the selection list types.
trans-unit.target: 该输入方法可以通过发出selectionListsChanged（）信号随时请求输入引擎更新选择列表。该信号将触发对此方法的调用，从而允许输入方法更新选择列表类型。

trans-unit.source: The input method must implement QVirtualKeyboardAbstractInputMethod (C++) or InputMethod (QML) interface and the plugin must register it as a QML type in {QVirtualKeyboardExtensionPlugin::registerTypes} method.
trans-unit.target: 输入方法必须实现QVirtualKeyboardAbstractInputMethod（C ++）或InputMethod（QML）接口，并且插件必须在{ QVirtualKeyboardExtensionPlugin :: registerTypes }方法中将其注册为QML类型。

trans-unit.source: The input method object created by this function can outlive keyboard layout transitions in certain cases. In particular, this applies to the transitions between the layouts listed in the sharedLayouts property.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，此函数创建的输入法对象可能会超过键盘布局转换。特别是，这适用于sharedLayouts属性中列出的布局之间的过渡。

trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，此函数创建的输入法对象可能会超过键盘布局转换。特别是，这适用于sharedLayouts属性中列出的布局之间的过渡。

trans-unit.source: The input method processes the data and discards the object when it is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 输入方法对数据进行处理,当不再需要该对象时,将其丢弃。

trans-unit.source: The input method returns properties about the state and position of the virtual keyboard. It also provides information about the position of the current focused input element.
trans-unit.target: 输入方法返回有关虚拟键盘的状态和位置的属性。它还提供了当前焦点输入元素的位置信息。

trans-unit.source: The input method should not show the characters while typing. This is automatically set when setting QLineEdit::echoMode to Password. Note that setting ImhHiddenText does not change the echo mode.
trans-unit.target: 输入法在键入时不应显示字符。当将QLineEdit :: echoMode设置为 Password 时，这是自动设置的。请注意，设置 ImhHiddenText 不会更改回显模式。

trans-unit.source: The input method should not try to automatically switch to upper case when a sentence ends.
trans-unit.target: 当一句话结束时,输入法不应该尝试自动切换为大写。

trans-unit.source: The input mode can either be set separately for each keyboard layout, or commonly at this context. If set separately, then this property should not be modified.
trans-unit.target: 输入模式可以为每个键盘布局单独设置,也可以在此上下文中共同设置。如果单独设置,则不应修改此属性。

trans-unit.source: The input should be opaque or unpremultiplied.

The input stream ended before a well-formed XML document was parsed. Recovery from this error is possible if more XML arrives in the stream, either by calling addData() or by waiting for it to arrive on the device().
trans-unit.target: 输入流在解析格式正确的XML文档之前结束。如果有更多XML到达流中，则可以通过调用addData（）或等待它到达设备（）来从此错误中恢复。

trans-unit.source: The instance of QHelpFilterSettingsWidget may be a part of a preferences dialog. Before showing the dialog, setAvailableComponents() and setAvailableVersions() should be called, otherwise the filter settings widget will only offer a creation of empty filters, which wouldn't be useful. In addition, readSettings should also be called to fill up the filter settings widget with the list of filters already stored in the filter engine. The creation of new filters, modifications to existing filters and removal of unneeded filters are handled by the widget automatically. If you want to store the current state of the widget and apply it to the filter engine e.g. after the user clicked the apply button - call applySettings().
The instance of QRadioData is already bound to this instance of QRadioTuner.

trans-unit.source: The item clips the painting of all its descendants to its own shape. Items that are either direct or indirect children of this item cannot draw outside this item's shape. By default, this flag is disabled; children can draw anywhere. This behavior is enforced by QGraphicsView::drawItems() or QGraphicsScene::drawItems(). This flag was introduced in Qt 4.3.
trans-unit.target: 该项目将其所有子代的画作夹在自己的形状中。屬於這個項目的直接或間接子項目,不能在這個項目的形狀外繪製。默认情况下,这个标志是禁用的;子项目可以在任何地方绘制。这个行为由QGraphicsView::drawItems()或QGraphicsScene::drawItems()强制执行。这个标志在Qt 4.3中被引入。

trans-unit.source: The item clips to its own shape. The item cannot draw or receive mouse, tablet, drag and drop or hover events outside its shape. It is disabled by default. This behavior is enforced by QGraphicsView::drawItems() or QGraphicsScene::drawItems(). This flag was introduced in Qt 4.3.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的夹子可以夹住它自己的形状。该项目不能在其形状之外绘制或接收鼠标、平板电脑、拖放或悬停事件。默认情况下,它被禁用。此行为由 QGraphicsView::drawItems()或 QGraphicsScene::drawItems()强制执行。这个标志在Qt 4.3中被引入。

trans-unit.source: The item does not have a window until it has been assigned into a scene. The windowChanged() signal provides a notification both when the item is entered into a scene and when it is removed from a scene.
trans-unit.target: 该项目在分配给场景之前没有窗口。所述windowChanged（）信号同时提供当该项目被输入到场景，并当它从一个场景删除的通知。

trans-unit.source: The item does not paint anything (i.e., calling paint() on the item has no effect). You should set this flag on items that do not need to be painted to ensure that Graphics View avoids unnecessary painting preparations. This flag was introduced in Qt 4.6.
trans-unit.target: 该项目不绘制任何内容（即，在该项目上调用paint（）无效）。您应该在不需要绘画的项目上设置此标志，以确保“图形视图”避免不必要的绘画准备。这个标志是在Qt 4.6中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The item doesn't propagate its opacity to its children. This flag allows you to create a semitransparent item that does not affect the opacity of its children. This flag was introduced in Qt 4.5.
trans-unit.target: 该项不会将不透明度传播给它的子项。这个标志允许你创建一个半透明的项目,不影响它的子项目的不透明度。这个标志在Qt 4.5中被引入。

trans-unit.source: The item enables itemChange() notifications for ItemPositionChange, ItemPositionHasChanged, ItemMatrixChange, ItemTransformChange, ItemTransformHasChanged, ItemRotationChange, ItemRotationHasChanged, ItemScaleChange, ItemScaleHasChanged, ItemTransformOriginPointChange, and ItemTransformOriginPointHasChanged. For performance reasons, these notifications are disabled by default. You must enable this flag to receive notifications for position and transform changes. This flag was introduced in Qt 4.6.
trans-unit.target: 该项目为ItemPositionChange，ItemPositionHasChanged，ItemMatrixChange，ItemTransformChange，ItemTransformHasChanged，ItemRotationChange，ItemRotationHasChanged，ItemScaleChange，ItemScaleHasChanged，ItemTransformOriginPointChange和ItemTransformOriginPointHasChanged启用itemChange（）通知。出于性能原因，默认情况下将禁用这些通知。您必须启用此标志才能接收位置和变换更改的通知。这个标志是在Qt 4.6中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The item enables itemChange() notifications for ItemPositionChange, ItemPositionHasChanged, ItemTransformChange, ItemTransformHasChanged, ItemRotationChange, ItemRotationHasChanged, ItemScaleChange, ItemScaleHasChanged, ItemTransformOriginPointChange, and ItemTransformOriginPointHasChanged. For performance reasons, these notifications are disabled by default. You must enable this flag to receive notifications for position and transform changes. This flag was introduced in Qt 4.6.

The item enables itemChange() notifications for ItemScenePositionHasChanged. For performance reasons, these notifications are disabled by default. You must enable this flag to receive notifications for scene position changes. This flag was introduced in Qt 4.6.

trans-unit.target: 该项目的状态不确定。例如，QCheckBox或QRadioButton被部分检查。

trans-unit.source: The item has no frame. For example, a frameless QSpinBox or QLineEdit.
trans-unit.target: 该项目没有框架。例如，无框架QSpinBox或QLineEdit。

trans-unit.source: The item has siblings. For example, an item in a QTreeView that siblings.
trans-unit.target: 该项目有兄弟姐妹。例如，QTreeView中具有同级项的项。

trans-unit.source: The item has vertical orientation.

trans-unit.source: The item ignores inherited transformations (i.e., its position is still anchored to its parent, but the parent or view rotation, zoom or shear transformations are ignored). This flag is useful for keeping text label items horizontal and unscaled, so they will still be readable if the view is transformed. When set, the item's view geometry and scene geometry will be maintained separately. You must call deviceTransform() to map coordinates and detect collisions in the view. By default, this flag is disabled. This flag was introduced in Qt 4.3.
trans-unit.target: 该项目将忽略继承的转换（即，其位置仍固定在其父项上，但是将忽略父项或视图的旋转，缩放或剪切转换）。此标志对于保持文本标签项目水平和不缩放很有用，因此，如果对视图进行了转换，它们仍将可读。设置后，项目的视图几何和场景几何将分别维护。您必须调用deviceTransform（）来映射坐标并检测视图中的碰撞。默认情况下，此标志是禁用的。这个标志是在Qt 4.3中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The item ignores its parent's opacity. The item's effective opacity is the same as its own; it does not combine with the parent's opacity. This flags allows your item to keep its absolute opacity even if the parent is semitransparent. This flag was introduced in Qt 4.5.
trans-unit.target: 该项目忽略其父项目的不透明度。项目的有效不透明度与它自己的不透明度相同;它不与父项目的不透明度合并。这个标志允许你的项目保持它的绝对不透明度,即使父项目是半透明的。这个标志在Qt 4.5中被引入。

trans-unit.source: The item in the file must be in Wavefront OBJ format and include vertices, normals, and UVs. It also needs to be in triangles.
trans-unit.target: 文件中的项目必须是Wavefront OBJ格式,并包括顶点、法线和UV。它还需要是三角形的。

trans-unit.source: The item is unchecked.
trans-unit.target: 该项目未选中。

trans-unit.target: 该项目被禁用。

trans-unit.target: 该项目已启用。

trans-unit.source: The item is a panel. A panel provides activation and contained focus handling. Only one panel can be active at a time (see QGraphicsItem::isActive()). When no panel is active, QGraphicsScene activates all non-panel items. Window items (i.e., QGraphicsItem::isWindow() returns true) are panels. This flag was introduced in Qt 4.6.
trans-unit.target: 该项目是一个面板。面板提供激活和包含的焦点处理。一次只能激活一个面板（请参阅QGraphicsItem :: isActive（））。如果没有面板处于活动状态，则QGraphicsScene会激活所有非面板项目。窗口项（即QGraphicsItem :: isWindow（）返回 true ）是面板。这个标志是在Qt 4.6中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The item is active, that is, the current item.
trans-unit.target: 该项目是活动的,也就是当前的项目。

trans-unit.source: The item is an exclusive check item (like a radio button).
trans-unit.target: 该项目是一个专属的检查项目(如单选按钮)。

trans-unit.source: The item is being activated (becoming the current item).
trans-unit.target: 该项目正在被激活(成为当前项目)。

trans-unit.source: The item is being deactivated (popped off).
trans-unit.target: 该项目正在停用(弹出)。

trans-unit.source: The item is being pressed using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 正在用鼠标按压该项目。

trans-unit.source: The item is checked.
trans-unit.target: 该项目已被选中。

trans-unit.source: The item is checked. For example, the checked state of QAbstractButton.
trans-unit.target: 该项目被检查。例如，QAbstractButton的检查状态。

trans-unit.source: The item is deleted
trans-unit.target: 该项目被删除

trans-unit.source: The item is deleted; When the destructor if an item runs, it should delete any graphics resources it has. If neither of the two conditions above were already met, the item will be part of a window and it is possible to use QQuickWindow::scheduleRenderJob() to have them cleaned up. If an implementation ignores the call to QQuickItem::releaseResources(), the item will in many cases no longer have access to a QQuickWindow and thus no means of scheduling cleanup.
trans-unit.target: 该项目被删除；当析构函数运行某项时，它应删除其拥有的所有图形资源。如果以上两个条件均未满足，则该项目将成为窗口的一部分，可以使用QQuickWindow :: scheduleRenderJob（）进行清理。如果实现忽略对QQuickItem :: releaseResources（）的调用，则该项目在许多情况下将不再具有对QQuickWindow的访问权限，因此将无法计划清除。

trans-unit.source: The item is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 该项目已启用。

trans-unit.source: The item is flat. For example, a flatQPushButton.
trans-unit.target: 该项目是扁平的。例如，一个扁平的QPushButton。

trans-unit.source: The item is forced to load.
trans-unit.target: 项目被强制加载。

trans-unit.source: The item is in the closed state. For example, an non-expanded item in a QTreeView
trans-unit.target: 该项目处于关闭状态。例如，QTreeView中的非展开项

trans-unit.source: The item is in the middle (in a list). For example, a tab that is not in the beginning or the end in a QTabBar.
trans-unit.target: 该项目在中间（在列表中）。例如，标签不在QTabBar的开头或结尾。

trans-unit.source: The item is in the open state. For example, an expanded item in a QTreeView, or a QComboBox or QPushButton with an open menu.
trans-unit.target: 该项目处于打开状态。例如，QTreeView中的展开项目，或带有打开菜单的QComboBox或QPushButton。

trans-unit.source: The item is inactive (or not in a stack).
trans-unit.target: 该项目不活动(或不在堆栈中)。

trans-unit.source: The item is marked read only or non-editable. For example, a read only QLineEdit or a non-editable QComboBox.
trans-unit.target: 该项目被标记为只读或不可编辑。例如，只读QLineEdit或不可编辑的QComboBox。

trans-unit.source: The item is maximized. For example, a maximized QMdiSubWindow.
trans-unit.target: 该项目已最大化。例如，最大化的QMdiSubWindow。

trans-unit.source: The item is minimized. For example, a minimized QMdiSubWindow.
trans-unit.target: 该项目被最小化。例如，最小化的QMdiSubWindow。

trans-unit.source: The item is moved to a new scene. This notification is also sent when the item is added to its initial scene, and when it is removed. The item's scene() is the old scene, or nullptr if the item has not been added to a scene yet. The value argument is the new scene (i.e., a QGraphicsScene pointer), or nullptr if the item is removed from a scene. Do not override this change by passing this item to QGraphicsScene::addItem() as this notification is delivered; instead, you can return the new scene from itemChange(). Use this feature with caution; objecting to a scene change can quickly lead to unwanted recursion.
trans-unit.target: 该项目将移动到新场景。当将该项目添加到其初始场景以及将其删除时，也会发送此通知。该项目的场景（）是旧场景，如果尚未将该项目添加到场景，则返回 nullptr 。 value参数是新场景（即QGraphicsScene指针），如果从场景中删除了该项，则为 nullptr 。在传递此通知时，请勿通过将此项目传递给QGraphicsScene :: addItem（）来覆盖此更改；相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回新场景。请谨慎使用此功能；反对场景更改会迅速导致不必要的递归。

trans-unit.source: The item is not checkable.
trans-unit.target: 该项目是无法检查的。

trans-unit.source: The item is not forced to load (and null is returned if not yet loaded).
trans-unit.target: 该项目不会被强制加载（如果尚未加载，则返回 null ）。

trans-unit.source: The item is part of a non-exclusive item group. For example, a menu item in a non-exclusive QActionGroup.
trans-unit.target: 该物料属于非专用物料组。例如，非专有QActionGroup中的菜单项。

trans-unit.source: The item is part of an exclusive item group. For example, a menu item in a exclusive QActionGroup.
trans-unit.target: 该物料属于专有物料组。例如，专用QActionGroup中的菜单项。

trans-unit.source: The item is partially checked. Items in hierarchical models may be partially checked if some, but not all, of their children are checked.
trans-unit.target: 该项被部分选中。分层模型中的项目,如果部分(而非全部)子项目被选中,则可能被部分选中。

trans-unit.source: The item is positioned at the bottom. For example, a QTabBar that has its tabs positioned at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 该项目位于底部。例如，QTabBar的选项卡位于底部。

trans-unit.source: The item is positioned at the left. For example, a QTabBar that has its tabs positioned at the left.
trans-unit.target: 该项目位于左侧。例如，一个QTabBar的选项卡位于左侧。

trans-unit.source: The item is positioned at the right. For example, a QTabBar that has its tabs positioned at the right.
trans-unit.target: 该项目位于右侧。例如，一个QTabBar的选项卡位于右侧。

trans-unit.source: The item is positioned at the top. For example, a QTabBar that has its tabs positioned at the top.
trans-unit.target: 该项目位于顶部。例如，一个QTabBar的选项卡位于顶部。

trans-unit.source: The item is removed from the scene
trans-unit.target: 该物品从场景中移除

trans-unit.source: The item is removed from the scene; If an item is taken out of the scene, for instance because it's parent was set to null or an item in another window, the QQuickItem::releaseResources() will be called on the GUI thread. QQuickWindow::scheduleRenderJob() should be used to schedule cleanup of rendering resources.
trans-unit.target: 该项目已从场景中移除；如果某个项目被带出场景，例如由于其父项设置为 null 或另一个窗口中的某个项目，则将在GUI线程上调用QQuickItem :: releaseResources（）。QQuickWindow :: scheduleRenderJob（）应该用于安排渲染资源的清理。

trans-unit.source: The item is rotated around its transform origin point, which by default is (0, 0). You can select a different transformation origin by calling setTransformOriginPoint().
trans-unit.target: 该项目绕其变换原点旋转，默认情况下为（0，0）。您可以通过调用setTransformOriginPoint（）来选择其他转换原点。

trans-unit.source: The item is rotated relative to its transform origin point (rotation(), transformOriginPoint())
trans-unit.target: 项相对于其变换原点旋转（rotation（），transformOriginPoint（））

trans-unit.source: The item is scaled around its transform origin point, which by default is (0, 0). You can select a different transformation origin by calling setTransformOriginPoint().
trans-unit.target: 该项目围绕其转换原点（默认为（0，0））缩放。您可以通过调用setTransformOriginPoint（）来选择其他转换原点。

trans-unit.source: The item is scaled relative to its transform origin point (scale(), transformOriginPoint())
trans-unit.target: 相对于其变换原点（scale（），transformOriginPoint（））缩放项目

trans-unit.source: The item is selected. For example, the selected tab in a QTabBar or the selected item in a QMenu.
trans-unit.target: 该项被选择。例如，在一个所选择的标签QTabBar或在所选择的项目QMenu。

trans-unit.source: The item is stacked behind its parent. By default, child items are stacked on top of the parent item. But setting this flag, the child will be stacked behind it. This flag is useful for drop shadow effects and for decoration objects that follow the parent item's geometry without drawing on top of it. This flag was introduced in Qt 4.5.
trans-unit.target: 项目堆叠在父项目的后面。默认情况下,子项目会堆叠在父项目的上方。但是设置这个标志,子项将堆叠在它的后面。这个标志对于阴影效果和装饰对象非常有用,因为这些对象会跟随父项目的几何体而不在其上面绘制。这个标志在Qt 4.5中被引入。

trans-unit.source: The item is the default. For example, a defaultQPushButton or a default action in a QMenu.
trans-unit.target: 该项目是默认设置。例如，默认的QPushButton或QMenu中的默认操作。

trans-unit.source: The item is the first (in a list). For example, the first tab in a QTabBar.
trans-unit.target: 该项目是第一个（列表中）。例如，QTabBar中的第一个选项卡。

trans-unit.source: The item is the last (in a list). For example, the last tab in a QTabBar.
trans-unit.target: 该项目是最后一个（在列表中）。例如，QTabBar中的最后一个选项卡。

trans-unit.source: The item is the only one (in a list). For example, a lone tab in a QTabBar.
trans-unit.target: 该项目是唯一的（在列表中）。例如，QTabBar中的一个单独的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: The item is the only one on the row, and is therefore both at the beginning and the end.
trans-unit.target: 该项目是该行唯一的一个项目,因此既是开头又是结尾。

trans-unit.source: The item is typically a transparent rectangle with a high contrast border.
trans-unit.target: 该项目通常是一个透明的长方形,边框对比度很高。

trans-unit.source: The item is unchecked.
trans-unit.target: 该项目未被选中。

trans-unit.source: The item layer. QGraphicsScene renders all items are in this layer by calling the virtual function drawItems(). The item layer is drawn after the background layer, but before the foreground layer.
trans-unit.target: 项目层。QGraphicsScene通过调用虚拟函数drawItems（）来渲染所有项目在该层中。项目层绘制在背景层之后，但在前景层之前。

trans-unit.source: The item makes use of either exposedRect or matrix in QStyleOptionGraphicsItem. By default, the exposedRect is initialized to the item's boundingRect() and the matrix is untransformed. You can enable this flag for the style options to be set up with more fine-grained values. Note that QStyleOptionGraphicsItem::levelOfDetail is unaffected by this flag and always initialized to 1. Use QStyleOptionGraphicsItem::levelOfDetailFromTransform() if you need a higher value. This flag was introduced in Qt 4.6.
trans-unit.target: 该项目使用QStyleOptionGraphicsItem中的暴露的Rect或矩阵。默认情况下，暴露的Rect初始化为项目的boundingRect（），并且矩阵未转换。您可以启用此标志，以使用更细粒度的值来设置样式选项。请注意，QStyleOptionGraphicsItem :: levelOfDetail不受此标志的影响，并且始终初始化为1。如果需要更高的值，请使用QStyleOptionGraphicsItem :: levelOfDetailFromTransform（）。这个标志是在Qt 4.6中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The item makes use of either exposedRect or matrix in QStyleOptionGraphicsItem. By default, the exposedRect is initialized to the item's boundingRect() and the matrix is untransformed. You can enable this flag for the style options to be set up with more fine-grained values. Note that QStyleOptionGraphicsItem::levelOfDetail is unaffected by this flag and always initialized to 1. Use QStyleOptionGraphicsItem::levelOfDetailFromTransform() if you need a higher value. This flag was introduced in Qt 4.6.
The item mesh file name. The item in the file must be in Wavefront OBJ format and include vertices, normals, and UVs. It also needs to be in triangles.
trans-unit.target: 项目网格文件名。文件中的项目必须是Wavefront OBJ格式,并包括顶点、法线和UV。它也需要是三角形的。

trans-unit.source: The item model role to map into bar rotation angle.
trans-unit.target: 项目模型作用映射成条形旋转角度。

trans-unit.source: The item model role to map into bar value.
trans-unit.target: 项目模型角色要映射成条形值。

trans-unit.source: The item model role to map into column category.
trans-unit.target: 项目模型角色要映射到栏目类别中。

trans-unit.source: The item model role to map into item rotation. The model may supply the value for rotation as either variant that is directly convertible to quaternion, or as one of the string representations: "scalar,x,y,z" or "@angle,x,y,z". The first format will construct the quaternion directly with given values, and the second one will construct the quaternion using QQuaternion::fromAxisAndAngle() method.
trans-unit.target: 映射到项目旋转的项目模型角色。模型可以将旋转值提供为可以直接转换为四元数的变体，也可以提供为字符串表示形式之一： "scalar,x,y,z" 或 "@angle,x,y,z" 。第一种格式将直接使用给定值构造四元数，第二种格式将使用QQuaternion :: fromAxisAndAngle（）方法构造四元数。

trans-unit.source: The item model role to map into row category.
trans-unit.target: 项目模型角色要映射到行类。

trans-unit.source: The item model role to map into the X position.
trans-unit.target: 项目模型角色要映射到X位置。

trans-unit.source: The item model role to map into the Y position.
trans-unit.target: 项目模型角色要映射到Y位。

trans-unit.source: The item model role to map into the Z position.
trans-unit.target: 项目模型角色要映射到Z位。

trans-unit.source: The item model role to map to the X position. If this role is not defined, columnRole is used to determine the X-coordinate value of the resolved QSurfaceDataItem items.
trans-unit.target: 映射到X位置的项目模型角色。如果未定义此角色，则columnRole用于确定已解析的 QSurfaceDataItem 项的X坐标值。

trans-unit.source: The item model role to map to the Y position.
trans-unit.target: 项目模型角色要映射到Y位。

trans-unit.source: The item model role to map to the Z position. If this role is not defined, rowRole is used to determine the Z-coordinate value of the resolved QSurfaceDataItem items.
trans-unit.target: 映射到Z位置的项目模型角色。如果未定义此角色，则rowRole用于确定已解析的 QSurfaceDataItem 项的Z坐标值。

trans-unit.source: The item model role to map to the column category. In addition to defining which column the data belongs to, the value indicated by the column role is also set as the X-coordinate value of QSurfaceDataItem when model data is resolved, unless a separate x position role is also defined.
trans-unit.target: 映射到列类别的项目模型角色。除了定义数据属于哪一列之外，解析模型数据时，除非定义了单独的x位置角色，否则由列角色指示的值还将设置为QSurfaceDataItem的X坐标值。

trans-unit.source: The item model role to map to the row category. In addition to defining which row the data belongs to, the value indicated by the row role is also set as the Z-coordinate value of QSurfaceDataItem when model data is resolved, unless a separate z position role is also defined.
trans-unit.target: 映射到行类别的项目模型角色。除了定义数据所属的行之外，解析模型数据时，除非定义了单独的z位置角色，否则行角色指示的值还将设置为QSurfaceDataItem的Z坐标值。

trans-unit.source: The item model to use as a data source for Scatter3D.
trans-unit.target: 用作Scatter3D数据源的项目模型。

trans-unit.source: The item model used as a data source for Surface3D.
trans-unit.target: 该项目模型用作Surface3D的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The item model.
trans-unit.target: 的项目模式。

trans-unit.source: The item never has child items. This is used for optimization purposes only.
trans-unit.target: 该项目从来没有子项目。这仅用于优化目的。

trans-unit.source: The item position as a vector3d type. Defaults to vector3d(0.0, 0.0, 0.0).
trans-unit.target: 项目位置为vector3d类型。默认为 vector3d(0.0, 0.0, 0.0) 。

trans-unit.source: The item prototype acts as a QStandardItem factory, by relying on the QStandardItem::clone() function. To provide your own prototype, subclass QStandardItem, reimplement QStandardItem::clone() and set the prototype to be an instance of your custom class. Whenever QStandardItemModel needs to create an item on demand (for instance, when a view or item delegate calls setData())), the new items will be instances of your custom class.
trans-unit.target: 依靠QStandardItem :: clone（）函数，项目原型充当QStandardItem工厂。要提供自己的原型，请子类QStandardItem，重新实现QStandardItem :: clone（）并将原型设置为自定义类的实例。每当QStandardItemModel需要按需创建项目时（例如，当视图或项目委托调用setData（）时），新项目将成为您的自定义类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The item rotation as a quaternion. Defaults to quaternion(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0).
trans-unit.target: 项旋转为四元数。默认为 quaternion(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0) 。

trans-unit.source: The item scaling as a vector3d type. Defaults to vector3d(0.1, 0.1, 0.1).
trans-unit.target: 项目缩放为vector3d类型。默认为 vector3d(0.1, 0.1, 0.1) 。

trans-unit.source: The item should be placed where the "About" menu item is in the application menu. The text of the menu item will be set to "About <application name>". The application name is fetched from the Info.plist file in the application's bundle (See Qt for macOS - Deployment).
trans-unit.target: 该项目应放置在应用程序菜单中“关于”菜单项的位置。菜单项的文本将设置为“关于<应用程序名称>”。从应用程序捆绑包中的 Info.plist 文件中获取应用程序名称（有关MacOS的Qt，请参见Qt-部署）。

trans-unit.source: The item should be placed where the "About" menu item is in the application menu. The text of the menu item will be set to "About <application name>". The application name is fetched from the Info.plist file in the application's bundle (See Qt for macOS - Deployment).
The item should be placed where the "Preferences..." menu item is in the application menu.
trans-unit.target: 该项目应放在应用程序菜单中 "偏好设置..."菜单项的位置。

trans-unit.source: The item should be placed where the Quit menu item is in the application menu.
trans-unit.target: 该项目应放在应用程序菜单中退出菜单项的位置。

trans-unit.source: The item should be put in the application menu based on the action's text (default)
trans-unit.target: 该项目应根据动作的文本放在应用程序菜单中(默认)。

trans-unit.source: The item should be put in the application menu with an application-specific role
trans-unit.target: 该项目应放在应用程序菜单中,并具有应用程序的特定角色。

trans-unit.source: The item should not be put into the application menu
trans-unit.target: 该项目不应放入应用菜单中

trans-unit.source: The item size of the GridView is determined by cellHeight and cellWidth. It will not resize the items based on the size of the root item in the delegate.
trans-unit.target: GridView的项目大小由cellHeight和cellWidth确定。它将不会根据委托中根项目的大小来调整项目的大小。

trans-unit.source: The item supports input methods typically used for Asian languages. This flag was introduced in Qt 4.6.
trans-unit.target: 该项支持通常用于亚洲语言的输入法。这个标志在Qt 4.6中被引入。

trans-unit.source: The item supports interactive movement using the mouse. By clicking on the item and then dragging, the item will move together with the mouse cursor. If the item has children, all children are also moved. If the item is part of a selection, all selected items are also moved. This feature is provided as a convenience through the base implementation of QGraphicsItem's mouse event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 该项目支持使用鼠标进行交互式移动。通过单击该项目然后拖动，该项目将与鼠标光标一起移动。如果该项目有孩子，则所有孩子也将移动。如果项目是选择的一部分，则所有选择的项目也会移动。通过QGraphicsItem的鼠标事件处理程序的基本实现，为方便起见提供了此功能。

trans-unit.source: The item supports keyboard input focus (i.e., it is an input item). Enabling this flag will allow the item to accept focus, which again allows the delivery of key events to QGraphicsItem::keyPressEvent() and QGraphicsItem::keyReleaseEvent().
trans-unit.target: 该项目支持键盘输入焦点（即，它是一个输入项目）。启用此标志将允许该项目接受焦点，这再次允许将键事件传递到QGraphicsItem :: keyPressEvent（）和QGraphicsItem :: keyReleaseEvent（）。

trans-unit.source: The item supports selection. Enabling this feature will enable setSelected() to toggle selection for the item. It will also let the item be selected automatically as a result of calling QGraphicsScene::setSelectionArea(), by clicking on an item, or by using rubber band selection in QGraphicsView.
trans-unit.target: 该项目支持选择。启用此功能将使setSelected（）可以切换项目的选择。通过调用QGraphicsScene :: setSelectionArea（），单击某个项目或在QGraphicsView中使用橡皮筋选择，它还将使该项目自动被选择。

trans-unit.source: The item that is selected at the index in the data array of the series. Only one item can be selected at a time. To clear selection from this series, invalidSelectionIndex is set as the index. If this series is added to a graph, the graph can adjust the selection according to user interaction or if it becomes invalid. Selecting an item on another added series will also clear the selection. Removing items from or inserting items to the series before the selected item will adjust the selection so that the same item will stay selected.
trans-unit.target: 在系列数据数组的索引处选择的项目。一次只能选择一项。为了清除该系列中的选择，将invalidSelectionIndex设置为索引。如果将此系列添加到图形，图形可以根据用户交互或无效而调整选择。在另一个添加的系列中选择一个项目也会清除选择。在选定项目之前从系列中删除项目或将项目插入到系列中将调整选择，以使同一项目保持选中状态。

trans-unit.source: The item that is targeted by the keyframe group.
The item to reparent via. This provides a way to do an unclipped animation when both the old parent and new parent are clipped.
trans-unit.target: 要通过重新parent的项目。这提供了一种方法,当旧的父项目和新的父项目都被剪接时,可以做一个不剪接的动画。

trans-unit.source: The item to reparent.
trans-unit.target: 补的项目。

trans-unit.source: The item view convenience classes use a classic item-based interface rather than a pure model/view approach. For a more flexible list view widget, consider using the QListView class with a standard model.
trans-unit.target: 项目视图便利类使用经典的基于项目的界面，而不是纯模型/视图方法。对于更灵活的列表视图窗口小部件，请考虑将QListView类与标准模型一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The item view is able to indicate a current item without changing the selection.
trans-unit.target: 项目视图能够在不改变选择的情况下指示当前项目。

trans-unit.source: The item view is performing an animation.
trans-unit.target: 项目视图正在执行动画。

trans-unit.source: The item was added to or removed from a scene. The QQuickWindow rendering the scene is specified in using ItemChangeData::window. The window parameter is null when the item is removed from a scene.
trans-unit.target: 该项目已添加到场景或从场景中删除。该QQuickWindow渲染的场景是在使用指定ItemChangeData ::窗口。从场景中删除项目时，window参数为null。

trans-unit.source: The item which currently has active focus or null if there is no item with active focus.
trans-unit.target: 当前具有活动焦点的项目；如果没有任何具有活动焦点的项目，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The item which the menu must stay within.
trans-unit.target: 菜单必须停留在的项目。

trans-unit.source: The item will be dropped above the index.
trans-unit.target: 该项目将落在索引之上。

trans-unit.source: The item will be dropped below the index.
trans-unit.target: 该项目将落在指数下方。

trans-unit.source: The item will be dropped on the index.
trans-unit.target: 该项目将落在索引上。

trans-unit.source: The item will be dropped onto a region of the viewport with no items. The way each view handles items dropped onto the viewport depends on the behavior of the underlying model in use.
trans-unit.target: 该项目将被投放到视口中没有项目的区域。每个视图处理掉落到视口上的项目的方式取决于所使用的底层模型的行为。

trans-unit.source: The item will be removed from QTreeWidgets to which it has been added. This makes it safe to delete an item at any time.
trans-unit.target: 该项目将从已添加到该项目的QTreeWidget中删除。这样可以随时安全地删除项目。

trans-unit.source: The item will receive all keyboard input to the scene until one of the following events occur:
trans-unit.target: 该项目将接收所有键盘输入的场景,直到发生以下事件之一。

trans-unit.source: The item will try to automatically determine whether the text should be treated as styled text. This determination is made using Qt::mightBeRichText().
trans-unit.target: 该项目将尝试自动确定是否将文本视为样式文本。使用Qt :: mightBeRichText（）进行确定。

trans-unit.source: The item will try to automatically determine whether the text should be treated as styled text. This determination is made using Qt::mightBeRichText(). However, detection of Markdown is not automatic.

The item will use linear interpolation for scaling if layer.smooth is set to true and will use mipmap for downsampling if layer.mipmap is set to true. Mipmapping may improve visual quality of downscaled items. For mipmapping of single Image items, prefer Image::mipmap.
trans-unit.target: 该项目将采用线性插值缩放如果layer.smooth设置为 true ，将使用纹理贴图进行采样，如果layer.mipmap设置为 true 。Mipmapping可以改善缩小项目的视觉质量。要映射单个Image项，请使用Image :: mipmap。

trans-unit.source: The item's Z-value changes. The value argument is the new Z-value (i.e., a double). Do not call setZValue() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered. Instead, you can return a new Z-value from itemChange().
trans-unit.target: 物品的Z值发生变化。value参数是新的Z值（即双精度）。传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setZValue（）。相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回新的Z值。

trans-unit.source: The item's Z-value has changed. The value argument is the new Z-value (i.e., a double). Do not call setZValue() as this notification is delivered. The return value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的Z值已更改。value参数是新的Z值（即双精度）。传递此通知时，请勿调用setZValue（）。返回值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The item's affine transformation matrix is changing. This value is obsolete; you can use ItemTransformChange instead.
trans-unit.target: 项目的仿射变换矩阵正在改变。这个值已经过时了,你可以用ItemTransformChange代替。

trans-unit.source: The item's base transform is applied (transform())
trans-unit.target: 应用项目的基本变换（transform（））

trans-unit.source: The item's brush is used to fill the item.
trans-unit.target: 项目的刷子是用来填充项目的。

trans-unit.source: The item's cursor changes. The value argument is the new cursor (i.e., a QCursor). Do not call setCursor() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered. Instead, you can return a new cursor from itemChange().
trans-unit.target: 项目的光标改变。value参数是新的游标（即QCursor）。传递此通知后，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setCursor（）。相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回一个新的光标。

trans-unit.source: The item's cursor has changed. The value argument is the new cursor (i.e., a QCursor). Do not call setCursor() as this notification is delivered. The return value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的光标已更改。value参数是新的游标（即QCursor）。传递此通知后，请勿调用setCursor（）。返回值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The item's enabled state changes. If the item is presently enabled, it will become disabled, and vice verca. The value argument is the new enabled state (i.e., true or false). Do not call setEnabled() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered. Instead, you can return the new state from itemChange().
trans-unit.target: 项目的启用状态更改。如果该项目当前已启用，它将被禁用，反之亦然。value参数是新的启用状态（即true或false）。传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setEnabled（）。相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回新状态。

trans-unit.source: The item's enabled state has changed. ItemChangeData::boolValue contains the new enabled state. (since Qt 5.10)
trans-unit.target: 项目的启用状态已更改。ItemChangeData :: boolValue包含新的启用状态。（自Qt 5.10起）

trans-unit.source: The item's enabled state has changed. The value argument is the new enabled state (i.e., true or false). Do not call setEnabled() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered. The return value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 项目的启用状态已更改。value参数是新的启用状态（即true或false）。传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setEnabled（）。返回值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The item's flags change. The value argument is the new flags (i.e., a quint32). Do not call setFlags() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered. Instead, you can return the new flags from itemChange().
trans-unit.target: 该项目的标志更改。value参数是新标记（即quint32）。传递此通知后，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setFlags（）。相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回新标志。

trans-unit.source: The item's flags have changed. The value argument is the new flags (i.e., a quint32). Do not call setFlags() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered. The return value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的标志已更改。value参数是新标记（即quint32）。传递此通知后，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setFlags（）。返回值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The item's focus has changed. ItemChangeData::boolValue contains whether the item has focus or not.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的重点已更改。ItemChangeData :: boolValue包含项目是否具有焦点。

trans-unit.source: The item's opacity changes. The value argument is the new opacity (i.e., a double). Do not call setOpacity() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered. Instead, you can return a new opacity from itemChange().
trans-unit.target: 项目的不透明度发生变化。value参数是新的不透明度（即double）。传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setOpacity（）。相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回新的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: The item's opacity has changed. ItemChangeData::realValue contains the new opacity.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的不透明度已更改。ItemChangeData :: realValue包含新的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: The item's opacity has changed. The value argument is the new opacity (i.e., a double). Do not call setOpacity() as this notification is delivered. The return value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的不透明度已更改。value参数是新的不透明度（即double）。传递此通知时，请勿调用setOpacity（）。返回值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The item's parent changes. The value argument is the new parent item (i.e., a QGraphicsItem pointer). Do not call setParentItem() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered; instead, you can return the new parent from itemChange().
trans-unit.target: 项目的父项更改。value参数是新的父项（即QGraphicsItem指针）。传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setParentItem（）。相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回新的父级。

trans-unit.source: The item's parent has changed. ItemChangeData::item contains the new parent.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的父项已更改。ItemChangeData :: item包含新的父级。

trans-unit.source: The item's parent has changed. The value argument is the new parent (i.e., a pointer to a QGraphicsItem). Do not call setParentItem() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered. The return value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的父项已更改。value参数是新的父对象（即，指向QGraphicsItem的指针）。传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setParentItem（）。返回值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The item's position changes. This notification is sent if the ItemSendsGeometryChanges flag is enabled, and when the item's local position changes, relative to its parent (i.e., as a result of calling setPos() or moveBy()). The value argument is the new position (i.e., a QPointF). You can call pos() to get the original position. Do not call setPos() or moveBy() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered; instead, you can return the new, adjusted position from itemChange(). After this notification, QGraphicsItem immediately sends the ItemPositionHasChanged notification if the position changed.
trans-unit.target: 物品的位置改变。如果启用了ItemSendsGeometryChanges标志，并且当项目的本地位置相对于其父项发生更改（即，由于调用setPos（）或moveBy（）的结果），则发送此通知。value参数是新位置（即QPointF）。您可以调用pos（）来获取原始位置。传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setPos（）或moveBy（）。相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回新的调整后的位置。收到此通知后，QGraphicsItem 如果位置更改，则立即发送ItemPositionHasChanged通知。

trans-unit.source: The item's position has changed. This notification is sent if the ItemSendsGeometryChanges flag is enabled, and after the item's local position, relative to its parent, has changed. The value argument is the new position (the same as pos()), and QGraphicsItem ignores the return value for this notification (i.e., a read-only notification).
trans-unit.target: 该项目的位置已更改。如果启用了ItemSendsGeometryChanges标志，并且在相对于其父项的项的本地位置发生更改后，将发送此通知。value参数是新位置（与pos（）相同），并且QGraphicsItem忽略此通知（即只读通知）的返回值。

trans-unit.source: The item's position is initialized to (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: 项目的位置被初始化为(0,0)。

trans-unit.source: The item's preferred text width can be set using setTextWidth() and obtained using textWidth().
trans-unit.target: 可以使用setTextWidth（）设置项目的首选文本宽度，并使用textWidth（）获得该宽度。

trans-unit.source: The item's rotation has changed. ItemChangeData::realValue contains the new rotation.
trans-unit.target: 项目的旋转方式已更改。ItemChangeData :: realValue包含新的旋转。

trans-unit.source: The item's rotation property changes. This notification is sent if the ItemSendsGeometryChanges flag is enabled, and when the item's rotation property changes (i.e., as a result of calling setRotation()). The value argument is the new rotation (i.e., a double); to get the old rotation, call rotation(). Do not call setRotation() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered; instead, you can return the new rotation from itemChange().
trans-unit.target: 项目的旋转属性更改。如果启用了ItemSendsGeometryChanges标志，并且项目的旋转属性发生更改（即，由于调用setRotation（）的结果），则发送此通知。 value参数是新的轮换（即double）；要获取旧的轮播，请调用rotation（）。传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setRotation（）；相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回新的旋转。

trans-unit.source: The item's rotation property has changed. This notification is sent if the ItemSendsGeometryChanges flag is enabled, and after the item's rotation property has changed. The value argument is the new rotation (i.e., a double), and QGraphicsItem ignores the return value for this notification (i.e., a read-only notification). Do not call setRotation() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered.
trans-unit.target: 项目的旋转属性已更改。如果启用了ItemSendsGeometryChanges标志，并且在更改了项目的rotation属性之后，将发送此通知。 value参数是新的轮换（即double），并且QGraphicsItem忽略此通知（即只读通知）的返回值。传递此通知后，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setRotation（）。

trans-unit.source: The item's scale property changes. This notification is sent if the ItemSendsGeometryChanges flag is enabled, and when the item's scale property changes (i.e., as a result of calling setScale()). The value argument is the new scale (i.e., a double); to get the old scale, call scale(). Do not call setScale() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered; instead, you can return the new scale from itemChange().
trans-unit.target: 项目的比例属性更改。如果启用了ItemSendsGeometryChanges标志，并且项目的scale属性发生更改（即，由于调用setScale（）的结果），则发送此通知。 value参数是新的小数位数（即double）；要获得旧的比例尺，请调用scale（）。在传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setScale（）。相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回新的比例。

trans-unit.source: The item's scale property has changed. This notification is sent if the ItemSendsGeometryChanges flag is enabled, and after the item's scale property has changed. The value argument is the new scale (i.e., a double), and QGraphicsItem ignores the return value for this notification (i.e., a read-only notification). Do not call setScale() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered.
trans-unit.target: 项目的比例属性已更改。如果启用了ItemSendsGeometryChanges标志，则在项目的scale属性更改后，将发送此通知。 value参数是新的刻度（即，双精度），并且QGraphicsItem忽略此通知（即，只读通知）的返回值。传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setScale（）。

trans-unit.source: The item's scene has changed. The item's scene() is the new scene. This notification is also sent when the item is added to its initial scene, and when it is removed.The value argument is the new scene (i.e., a pointer to a QGraphicsScene). Do not call setScene() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered. The return value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的场景已更改。该项目的场景（）是新场景。当将该项目添加到其初始场景以及将其删除时，也会发送此通知。value参数是新场景（即，指向QGraphicsScene的指针）。传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setScene（）。返回值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The item's scene position has changed. This notification is sent if the ItemSendsScenePositionChanges flag is enabled, and after the item's scene position has changed (i.e., the position or transformation of the item itself or the position or transformation of any ancestor has changed). The value argument is the new scene position (the same as scenePos()), and QGraphicsItem ignores the return value for this notification (i.e., a read-only notification).
trans-unit.target: 该项目的场景位置已更改。如果启用了ItemSendsScenePositionChanges标志，并且在项目的场景位置已更改（即，项目本身的位置或变形或任何祖先的位置或变形已更改）之后，将发送此通知。 value参数是新的场景位置（与scenePos（）相同），并且QGraphicsItem忽略此通知（即只读通知）的返回值。

trans-unit.source: The item's selected state changes. If the item is presently selected, it will become unselected, and vice verca. The value argument is the new selected state (i.e., true or false). Do not call setSelected() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered; instead, you can return the new selected state from itemChange().
trans-unit.target: 项目的选择状态发生变化。如果当前已选择该项目，则它将变为未选择状态，反之亦然。value参数是新的选定状态（即true或false）。传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setSelected（）。相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回新的选定状态。

trans-unit.source: The item's selected state has changed. The value argument is the new selected state (i.e., true or false). Do not call setSelected() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered. The return value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 项目的选择状态已更改。value参数是新的选定状态（即true或false）。传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setSelected（）。返回值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The item's state depends on the state of its children. This enables automatic management of the state of parent items in QTreeWidget (checked if all children are checked, unchecked if all children are unchecked, or partially checked if only some children are checked).
trans-unit.target: 项目的状态取决于其子级的状态。这样可以在QTreeWidget中自动管理父项的状态（检查是否选中了所有子项；如果选中了所有子项，则不选中；如果仅选中了一些子项，则部分选中）。

trans-unit.source: The item's tooltip changes. The value argument is the new tooltip (i.e., a QToolTip). Do not call setToolTip() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered. Instead, you can return a new tooltip from itemChange().
trans-unit.target: 该项目的工具提示会更改。value参数是新的工具提示（即QToolTip）。不要叫setToolTip在（）itemChange（），因为该通知送到。相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回新的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The item's tooltip has changed. The value argument is the new tooltip (i.e., a QToolTip). Do not call setToolTip() as this notification is delivered. The return value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的工具提示已更改。value参数是新的工具提示（即QToolTip）。传递此通知后，请勿调用setToolTip（）。返回值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The item's transform origin point property changes. This notification is sent if the ItemSendsGeometryChanges flag is enabled, and when the item's transform origin point property changes (i.e., as a result of calling setTransformOriginPoint()). The value argument is the new origin point (i.e., a QPointF); to get the old origin point, call transformOriginPoint(). Do not call setTransformOriginPoint() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered; instead, you can return the new transform origin point from itemChange().
trans-unit.target: 该项的变换原点属性会更改。如果启用了ItemSendsGeometryChanges标志，并且项目的变换原点属性发生更改（即，由于调用setTransformOriginPoint（）的结果），则发送此通知。 value参数是新的原点（即QPointF）；要获取旧的原点，请调用transformOriginPoint（）。发送此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setTransformOriginPoint（）。相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回新的变换原点。

trans-unit.source: The item's transform origin point property has changed. This notification is sent if the ItemSendsGeometryChanges flag is enabled, and after the item's transform origin point property has changed. The value argument is the new origin point (i.e., a QPointF), and QGraphicsItem ignores the return value for this notification (i.e., a read-only notification). Do not call setTransformOriginPoint() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的变换原点属性已更改。如果启用了ItemSendsGeometryChanges标志，并且在更改了项的变换原点属性之后，将发送此通知。 value参数是新的起点（即QPointF），并且QGraphicsItem忽略此通知（即只读通知）的返回值。传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setTransformOriginPoint（）。

trans-unit.source: The item's transformation matrix changes. This notification is sent if the ItemSendsGeometryChanges flag is enabled, and when the item's local transformation matrix changes (i.e., as a result of calling setTransform(). The value argument is the new matrix (i.e., a QTransform); to get the old matrix, call transform(). Do not call setTransform() or set any of the transformation properties in itemChange() as this notification is delivered; instead, you can return the new matrix from itemChange(). This notification is not sent if you change the transformation properties.
trans-unit.target: 物品的变换矩阵改变。如果启用了ItemSendsGeometryChanges标志，并且在项的本地转换矩阵发生更改时（例如，由于调用setTransform（）的结果，则发送此通知。value参数是新矩阵（即QTransform）；以获取旧矩阵） ，请调用transform（）。请勿在传递此通知时调用setTransform（）或在itemChange（）中设置任何转换属性；相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回新矩阵。如果您进行更改，则不会发送此通知转换属性。

trans-unit.source: The item's transformation matrix has changed either because setTransform is called, or one of the transformation properties is changed. This notification is sent if the ItemSendsGeometryChanges flag is enabled, and after the item's local transformation matrix has changed. The value argument is the new matrix (same as transform()), and QGraphicsItem ignores the return value for this notification (i.e., a read-only notification).
trans-unit.target: 由于调用setTransform或更改了转换属性之一，因此该项目的转换矩阵已更改。如果启用了ItemSendsGeometryChanges标志，并且在更改了项目的本地转换矩阵之后，将发送此通知。value参数是新矩阵（与transform（）相同），并且QGraphicsItem忽略此通知（即只读通知）的返回值。

trans-unit.source: The item's transformations list is applied in order (transformations())
trans-unit.target: 项目的转换列表按顺序应用（转换（））

trans-unit.source: The item's visibility has changed. ItemChangeData::boolValue contains the new visibility.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的可见性已更改。ItemChangeData :: boolValue包含新的可见性。

trans-unit.source: The item's visible state changes. If the item is presently visible, it will become invisible, and vice verca. The value argument is the new visible state (i.e., true or false). Do not call setVisible() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered; instead, you can return the new visible state from itemChange().
trans-unit.target: 物品的可见状态改变。如果该项目当前可见，它将变为不可见，反之亦然。value参数是新的可见状态（即true或false）。传递此通知时，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setVisible（）。相反，您可以从itemChange（）返回新的可见状态。

trans-unit.source: The item's visible state has changed. The value argument is the new visible state (i.e., true or false). Do not call setVisible() in itemChange() as this notification is delivered. The return value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的可见状态已更改。value参数是新的可见状态（即true或false）。传递此通知后，请勿在itemChange（）中调用setVisible（）。返回值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The item-based widgets have names which reflect their uses: QListWidget provides a list of items, QTreeWidget displays a multi-level tree structure, and QTableWidget provides a table of cell items. Each class inherits the behavior of the QAbstractItemView class which implements common behavior for item selection and header management.
trans-unit.target: 基于项目的小部件具有反映其用途的名称： QListWidget 提供项目列表， QTreeWidget 显示多级树结构， QTableWidget 提供单元项目表。每个类都继承了 QAbstractItemView 类的行为，该类实现了用于项目选择和标头管理的常见行为。

trans-unit.source: The items are laid out all at once.
trans-unit.target: 项目一下子就铺开了。

trans-unit.source: The items are laid out horizontally (default).
trans-unit.target: 项目是水平排列的(默认)。

trans-unit.source: The items are laid out in batches of batchSize items.
trans-unit.target: 这些项目按BatchSize项目的批次进行布局。

trans-unit.source: The items are laid out in the view from the left to the right.
trans-unit.target: 从左到右的视图中摆放物品。

trans-unit.source: The items are laid out in the view from the top to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 物品从上到下依次摆放在视野中。

trans-unit.source: The items are laid out using LeftToRight flow, with Large size and Free movement
trans-unit.target: 使用LeftToRight流程对项目进行布局，尺寸较大且可以自由移动

trans-unit.source: The items are laid out using TopToBottom flow, with Small size and Static movement
trans-unit.target: 使用TopToBottom流，小尺寸和静态移动来布置项目

trans-unit.source: The items are laid out vertically.
trans-unit.target: 项目是竖着摆放的。

trans-unit.source: The items are populated with method callbacks which will provide the number of items in a list as well as the data for individual items.
trans-unit.target: 项目是由方法回调填充的,它将提供一个列表中的项目数量以及单个项目的数据。

trans-unit.source: The items are returned in descending stacking order (i.e., the first item in the list is the uppermost item, and the last item is the lowermost item).
trans-unit.target: 列表中的项目以降序堆叠的方式返回(即列表中的第一个项目是最上面的项目,最后一个项目是最下面的项目)。

trans-unit.source: The items are sorted ascending e.g. starts with 'AAA' ends with 'ZZZ' in Latin-1 locales
trans-unit.target: 项目按升序排列,例如,在拉丁语-1地区,以'AAA'开头,以'ZZZ'结尾。

trans-unit.source: The items are sorted by descending stacking order (i.e., the first item in the returned list is the uppermost item).
trans-unit.target: 列表中的项目按降序堆叠排序(即返回的列表中第一个项目是最上面的项目)。

trans-unit.source: The items are sorted by stacking order. This takes into account both the items' insertion order and their Z-values.
trans-unit.target: 项目按堆叠顺序排序。这考虑到了项目的插入顺序和它们的Z值。

trans-unit.source: The items are sorted descending e.g. starts with 'ZZZ' ends with 'AAA' in Latin-1 locales
trans-unit.target: 项目是按降序排列的,例如,在拉丁语-1地区,以'ZZZ'开始,以'AAA'结束。

trans-unit.source: The items are sorted in descending stacking order (i.e., the first item in the returned list is the uppermost item).
trans-unit.target: 项目按降序堆叠排序(即返回列表中的第一个项目是最上面的项目)。

trans-unit.source: The items are traversed in ascending key order.
trans-unit.target: 项目按升键顺序遍历。

trans-unit.source: The items available through the model can be searched for particular data using the match() function.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用match（）函数在模型中可用的项目中搜索特定数据。

trans-unit.source: The items can be closed. For example, the QDockWidget has the QDockWidget::DockWidgetClosable feature turned on.
trans-unit.target: 这些项目可以关闭。例如，QDockWidget 启用了QDockWidget :: DockWidgetClosable功能。

trans-unit.source: The items can be floated. For example, the QDockWidget has the QDockWidget::DockWidgetFloatable feature turned on.
trans-unit.target: 这些项目可以浮动。例如，QDockWidget 启用了QDockWidget :: DockWidgetFloatable功能。

trans-unit.source: The items can be moved freely by the user.
trans-unit.target: 项目可以由用户自由移动。

trans-unit.source: The items cannot be moved by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户不能移动物品。

trans-unit.source: The items in the Application Menu will be merged correctly for localized applications, but they will not show up translated until the application bundle contains a localized resource folder. to the application bundle.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序菜单中的项目将被正确地合并到本地化的应用程序中,但它们不会显示被翻译,直到应用程序捆绑包含一个本地化的资源文件夹。 到应用程序捆绑。

trans-unit.source: The items in the selection area are added to the currently selected items.
trans-unit.target: 选择区的项目会被添加到当前选择的项目中。

trans-unit.source: The items in the tree can be sorted by column according to a predefined sort order. If sorting is enabled, the user can sort the items by clicking on a column header. Sorting can be enabled or disabled by calling setSortingEnabled(). The isSortingEnabled() function indicates whether sorting is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 可以根据预定义的排序顺序对列中的树进行排序。如果启用了排序，则用户可以通过单击列标题来对项目进行排序。可以通过调用setSortingEnabled（）启用或禁用排序。该isSortingEnabled（）函数指示排序是否启用。

trans-unit.source: The items in the view are rendered using a delegate. The default delegate, QItemDelegate, handles the most common data types (int, QString, QImage, etc.). The delegate is also responsible for providing editor widgets (e.g., a combobox) when the user starts editing an item in the view. You can create your own delegates by subclassing QAbstractItemDelegate or QItemDelegate. See Model/View Programming for more information.

trans-unit.source: The keyboard layouts are scalable, which means that there cannot be any fixed sizes set for any items in the layout. Instead, the key widths are calculated from key weight in relation to each other and the height by dividing the space equally among the keyboard rows.
trans-unit.target: 键盘布局是可扩展的,这意味着不能为布局中的任何项目设置任何固定尺寸。相反,键宽是根据键重与键高的关系计算出来的,而键高则是通过将键盘行之间的空间平均划分出来的。

trans-unit.source: The keyboard layouts cannot specify any visual elements. Instead, the layout is visualized by the keyboard style. On the other hand, the keyboard style cannot affect the size of the keyboard layout.

trans-unit.source: The last two arguments of the match() and the globalMatch() functions set the match type and the match options. It is also possible to enable partial matching of the regular expression against a subject string: see the partial matching section for more details.

trans-unit.source: The latitude, longitude and altitude attributes stored in the coordinate type are represented as doubles, giving them approximately 16 decimal digits of precision -- enough to specify micrometers. The calculations performed in coordinate's methods such as azimuthTo() and distanceTo() also use doubles for all intermediate values, but the inherent inaccuracies in their spherical Earth model dominate the amount of error in their output.
trans-unit.target: 存储在坐标类型中的纬度，经度和海拔高度属性以双精度表示，使它们的精度大约为16个十进制数字-足以指定千分尺。在坐标方法（例如azimuthTo（）和distanceTo（））中执行的计算还对所有中间值使用了double值，但是其球形地球模型中固有的不准确性决定了其输出中的误差量。

trans-unit.source: The layout of a document is determined by the documentLayout(); you can create your own QAbstractTextDocumentLayout subclass and set it using setDocumentLayout() if you want to use your own layout logic. The document's title and other meta-information can be obtained by calling the metaInformation() function. For documents that are exposed to users through the QTextEdit class, the document title is also available via the QTextEdit::documentTitle() function.
trans-unit.target: 文档的布局由documentLayout（）确定；如果您想使用自己的布局逻辑，则可以创建自己的QAbstractTextDocumentLayout子类并使用setDocumentLayout（）对其进行设置。可以通过调用metaInformation（）函数来获取文档的标题和其他元信息。对于通过QTextEdit类向用户公开的文档，也可以通过QTextEdit :: documentTitle（）函数获得文档标题。

trans-unit.source: The layout of a document is only relevant when it is to be displayed on a device, or when some information is requested that requires a visual representation of the document. Until this occurs, the document does not need to be formatted and prepared for a device.
trans-unit.target: 只有当文件要在设备上显示时,或当要求提供一些需要文件视觉表现的信息时,文件的布局才有意义。在这之前,文件不需要为设备进行格式化和准备。

trans-unit.source: The layout of the buttons, with regard to element bounds, varies from style to style. This makes it difficult to show conceptual images of this. PE_PushButtonBevel is also responsible for drawing the menu indicator (QCommonStyle draws PE_IndicatorArrowDown).

The layout takes over responsibility of the items added. Since QLayoutItem does not inherit QObject, we must delete the items manually. In the destructor, we remove each item from the list using takeAt(), and then delete it.
trans-unit.target: 布局负责添加的项目的责任。由于QLayoutItem不继承QObject，因此我们必须手动删除这些项目。在析构函数中，我们使用 takeAt() 从列表中删除每个项目，然后将其删除。

trans-unit.source: The layout takes ownership of the items. In some cases when the layout item also inherits from QGraphicsItem (such as QGraphicsWidget) there will be a ambiguity in ownership because the layout item belongs to two ownership hierarchies. See the documentation of QGraphicsLayoutItem::setOwnedByLayout() how to handle this. You can access each item in the layout by calling count() and itemAt(). Calling removeAt() will remove an item from the layout, without destroying it.
trans-unit.target: 布局获取项目的所有权。在某些情况下，当布局项目也继承自QGraphicsItem（例如QGraphicsWidget）时，所有权将不明确，因为布局项目属于两个所有权层次结构。请参阅QGraphicsLayoutItem :: setOwnedByLayout（）的文档以了解如何处理。您可以通过调用count（）和itemAt（）来访问布局中的每个项目。调用removeAt（）会从布局中删除一个项目，而不会破坏它。

trans-unit.source: The layout's geometry can be set and retrieved with setGeometry() and geometry(), and its alignment with setAlignment() and alignment().
trans-unit.target: 可以使用setGeometry（）和geometry（）设置和检索布局的几何图形，并使用setAlignment（）和alignment（）对其进行对齐。

trans-unit.source: The leaf nodes in a blend tree are containers for the input animation clips. These clips can be baked clips read from file via QAnimationClipLoader, or they can be clips that you build within your application with QAnimatitonClip and QAnimationClipData. To include a clip in your blend tree, wrap it in a QClipBlendValue node.

The leaf nodes in a blend tree are containers for the input animation clips. These clips can be baked clips read from file via QAnimationClipLoader, or they can be clips that you build within your application with QAnimatitonClip and QAnimationClipData. To include a clip in your blend tree, wrap it in a QClipBlendValue node.

trans-unit.source: The leaf nodes in a blend tree are containers for the input animation clips. The leaf nodes in a blend tree are containers for the input animation clips. These clips can be baked clips read from file via AnimationClipLoader, or they can be clips that you build within your application with AnimatitonClip and AnimationClipData. To include a clip in your blend tree, wrap it in a ClipBlendValue node.

trans-unit.source: The length of the slider is usually related to the value of the page step, and typically represents the proportion of the document area shown in a scrolling view. The page step is the amount that the value changes by when the user presses the Page Up and Page Down keys, and is set with setPageStep(). Smaller changes to the value defined by the line step are made using the cursor keys, and this quantity is set with setSingleStep().
trans-unit.target: 滑块的长度通常与页面步长有关，并且通常代表滚动视图中显示的文档区域的比例。Page step是用户按下Page Up和Page Down键时值更改的量，并使用setPageStep（）进行设置。使用光标键对行步定义的值进行较小的更改，并使用setSingleStep（）设置此数量。

trans-unit.source: The length of the text can be constrained to maxLength(). The text can be arbitrarily constrained using a validator() or an inputMask(), or both. When switching between a validator and an input mask on the same line edit, it is best to clear the validator or input mask to prevent undefined behavior.
trans-unit.target: 文本的长度可以限制为maxLength（）。可以使用验证器（）或inputMask（）或两者任意约束文本。在同一行编辑器的验证器和输入掩码之间切换时，最好清除验证器或输入掩码，以防止发生未定义的行为。

The linear transfer functions

The lines and curves stretch from the currentPosition() to the position passed as argument. The currentPosition() of the QPainterPath object is always the end position of the last subpath that was added (or the initial start point). The moveTo() function can be used to move the currentPosition() without adding a line or curve, creating a QPainterPath::MoveToElement component.
trans-unit.target: 直线和曲线从currentPosition（）延伸到作为参数传递的位置。QPainterPath对象的currentPosition（）始终是最后添加的子路径的结束位置（或初始起点）。所述的moveTo（）函数可以被用于移动currentPosition而不增加的直线或曲线（），创建一个QPainterPath :: MoveToElement组件。

trans-unit.source: The machine has selected a transition whose source and targets are not part of the same tree of states, and thus are not part of the same state machine. Commonly, this could mean that one of the states has not been given any parent or added to any machine. The context of this error is the source state of the transition.
trans-unit.target: 机器选择了一个过渡,其源和目标不属于同一个状态树,因此不属于同一个状态机。通常情况下,这可能意味着其中一个状态没有被赋予任何父级或添加到任何机器中。这个错误的上下文是过渡的源状态。

trans-unit.source: The machine is event driven and keeps its own event loop. Events are posted to the machine through postEvent(). Note that this means that it executes asynchronously, and that it will not progress without a running event loop. You will normally not have to post events to the machine directly as Qt's transitions, e.g., QEventTransition and its subclasses, handle this. But for custom transitions triggered by events, postEvent() is useful.
trans-unit.target: 机器是事件驱动的，并保留自己的事件循环。事件通过postEvent（）发布到计算机。请注意，这意味着它异步执行，并且没有运行的事件循环就不会继续执行。通常，由于Qt的转换（例如QEventTransition及其子类）可以处理事件，因此通常不必直接将事件发布到计算机。但是对于事件触发的自定义转换，postEvent（）很有用。

trans-unit.source: The machine's childMode property was set to QState::ParallelStates. This is illegal. Only states may be declared as parallel, not the state machine itself. This enum value was added in Qt 5.14.

trans-unit.source: The main advantage of painter paths over normal drawing operations is that complex shapes only need to be created once; then they can be drawn many times using only calls to the QPainter::drawPath() function.
trans-unit.target: 与常规绘图操作相比，画家路径的主要优势在于，复杂的形状只需要创建一次即可。然后可以仅使用对QPainter :: drawPath（）函数的调用来绘制多次。

trans-unit.source: The main benefit of this approach is that all painting follows the same painting pipeline making it easy to add support for new features and providing default implementations for unsupported ones.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法的主要好处是,所有的绘画都遵循相同的绘画管道,这使得它很容易为新功能添加支持,并为不支持的功能提供默认实现。

trans-unit.source: The main consequence is that you should use pointers to QObject (or to your QObject subclass) where you might otherwise be tempted to use your QObject subclass as a value. For example, without a copy constructor, you can't use a subclass of QObject as the value to be stored in one of the container classes. You must store pointers.
trans-unit.target: 主要结果是您应该使用指向QObject（或指向QObject子类）的指针，否则您可能会倾向于将QObject子类用作值。例如，没有复制构造函数，就不能使用QObject的子类作为要存储在容器类之一中的值。您必须存储指针。

trans-unit.source: The main consequence is that you should use pointers to QObject (or to your QObject subclass) where you might otherwise be tempted to use your QObject subclass as a value. For example, without a copy constructor, you can't use a subclass of QObject as the value to be stored in one of the container classes. You must store pointers.

The main difference between top-level items and those in lower levels of the tree is that a top-level item has no parent(). This information can be used to tell the difference between items, and is useful to know when inserting and removing items from the tree. Children of an item can be removed with takeChild() and inserted at a given index in the list of children with the insertChild() function.
trans-unit.target: 顶级项目与树的较低级别项目之间的主要区别在于，顶级项目没有父项（）。此信息可用于区分项目之间的区别，并且有助于了解何时从树中插入和删除项目。可以使用takeChild（）删除项目的子项，并使用insertChild（）函数将其插入子项列表中的给定索引。

trans-unit.source: The main differences between the Grid and Flow positioners are that items inside a Flow will wrap when they run out of space on the minor axis, and items on one line may not be aligned with items on another line if the items do not have uniform sizes. As with Grid items, there is no independent control of spacing between items and between lines of items.
trans-unit.target: Grid和Flow定位器的主要区别是,Flow内的项目在小轴上用完空间时将会被包裹,如果项目的尺寸不统一,则一行的项目可能不会与另一行的项目对齐。与Grid项目一样,项目之间和项目行之间的间距无法独立控制。

trans-unit.source: The map created by this function has no explicit length. Instead, its length is implied by the elements contained in it. Note, however, that use of indeterminate-length maps is not compliant with canonical CBOR encoding (canonical encoding also requires keys to be unique and in sorted order).
trans-unit.target: 这个函数创建的地图没有明确的长度。相反,它的长度是由其中包含的元素暗示的。但是请注意,使用不确定长度的映射不符合CBOR规范编码(规范编码也要求密钥是唯一的,并且是按顺序排列的)。

trans-unit.target: map函数的形式必须是:

trans-unit.source: The mapped memory is populated with data from the video buffer when mapped, but the content of the mapped memory may be discarded when unmapped.
trans-unit.target: 映射时,被映射的存储器会被来自视频缓冲区的数据填充,但未映射时,被映射的存储器的内容可能会被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: The mapped memory is populated with data from the video buffer, and the video buffer is repopulated with the content of the mapped memory when it is unmapped.
trans-unit.target: 被映射的内存被视频缓冲区的数据填充,视频缓冲区在未被映射时,重新填充被映射内存的内容。

trans-unit.source: The mapped memory is uninitialized when mapped, but the possibly modified content will be used to populate the video buffer when unmapped.
trans-unit.target: 映射时,映射的内存是未初始化的,但在未映射时,可能被修改的内容将被用于填充视频缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The mapped memory will be private, so any modifications will not be visible to other processes and will not be written to disk. Any such modifications will be lost when the memory is unmapped. It is unspecified whether modifications made to the file made after the mapping is created will be visible through the mapped memory. This enum value was introduced in Qt 5.4.
trans-unit.target: 映射的内存将是私有的,所以任何修改都不会被其他进程看到,也不会写入磁盘。任何这样的修改都会在内存解除映射后丢失。没有说明在创建映射后对文件的修改是否会通过映射的内存可见。这个枚举值是在Qt 5.4中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The mapping is done via the JSON configuration file specified in QT_QPA_EGLFS_KMS_CONFIG and described in the previous sections. When a touchDevice property is present in an element of the outputs array, the value is treated as a device node and the touch device is associated with the display output in question.
trans-unit.target: 映射是通过 QT_QPA_EGLFS_KMS_CONFIG 中指定的JSON配置文件完成的，并在前面的部分中进行了描述。当 outputs 的元素中存在 touchDevice 属性时，该值将被视为设备节点，并且触摸设备将与相关的显示输出相关联。

trans-unit.source: The mapping of the logical QPainter coordinates to the physical QPaintDevice coordinates are handled by QPainter's transformation matrix, viewport and "window". The logical and physical coordinate systems coincide by default. QPainter also supports coordinate transformations (e.g. rotation and scaling).
trans-unit.target: 逻辑QPainter坐标到物理QPaintDevice坐标的映射由QPainter的变换矩阵，视口和“窗口”处理。默认情况下，逻辑坐标系和物理坐标系重合。QPainter还支持坐标转换（例如旋转和缩放）。

trans-unit.source: The mapping of the logical coordinates to the physical coordinates are handled by QPainter's world transformation worldTransform() (described in the Transformations section), and QPainter's viewport() and window(). The viewport represents the physical coordinates specifying an arbitrary rectangle. The "window" describes the same rectangle in logical coordinates. By default the logical and physical coordinate systems coincide, and are equivalent to the paint device's rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 逻辑坐标到物理坐标的映射由QPainter的世界变换worldTransform（）（在Transformations部分中介绍）以及QPainter的viewport（）和window（）处理。视口代表指定任意矩形的物理坐标。“窗口”在逻辑坐标中描述了相同的矩形。默认情况下，逻辑坐标系和物理坐标系重合，并且等效于绘画设备的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The mapping of the logical coordinates to the physical coordinates are handled by QPainter's world transformation worldTransform() (described in the Transformations section), and QPainter's viewport() and window(). The viewport represents the physical coordinates specifying an arbitrary rectangle. The "window" describes the same rectangle in logical coordinates. By default the logical and physical coordinate systems coincide, and are equivalent to the paint device's rectangle.
The mapping will have the same open mode as the file (read and/or write), except when using MapPrivateOption, in which case it is always possible to write to the mapped memory.
trans-unit.target: 映射将具有与文件相同的打开模式（读和/或写），但使用MapPrivateOption时除外，在这种情况下，始终可以写入映射的内存。

trans-unit.source: The margin beyond the bounds of the parent item within which an event point can activate this handler. For example, on a PinchHandler where the target is also the parent, it's useful to set this to a distance at least half the width of a typical user's finger, so that if the parent has been scaled down to a very small size, the pinch gesture is still possible. Or, if a TapHandler-based button is placed near the screen edge, it can be used to comply with Fitts's Law: react to mouse clicks at the screen edge even though the button is visually spaced away from the edge by a few pixels.

Or, if a TapHandler-based button is placed near the screen edge, it can be used to comply with Fitts's Law: react to mouse clicks at the screen edge even though the button is visually spaced away from the edge by a few pixels.

Or, if a TapHandler-based button is placed near the screen edge, it can be used to comply with Fitts's Law: react to mouse clicks at the screen edge even though the button is visually spaced away from the edge by a few pixels.
trans-unit.target: 超出父项边界的边距，事件点可以在该边界内激活此处理程序。例如，在目标也是 parent 对象的PinchHandler上，将其设置为至少是普通用户手指宽度的一半的距离很有用，这样，如果 parent 已缩小到很小的尺寸，则可能会捏手势仍然可能。或者，如果将基于TapHandler的按钮放置在屏幕边缘附近，则可以用来遵循Fitts定律：即使按钮在视觉上与边缘之间的距离为几像素，也可以对屏幕边缘的鼠标单击做出反应。

For example, on a PinchHandler where the target is also the parent, it's useful to set this to a distance at least half the width of a typical user's finger, so that if the parent has been scaled down to a very small size, the pinch gesture is still possible. The margin default is provided by the style. The default margin most Qt styles specify is 9 for child widgets and 11 for windows. The spacing defaults to the same as the margin width for a top-level layout, or to the same as the parent layout.

In case of a line or spline series, the legend marker looks like a small segment of the line. For other series types, rectangular markers are shown.
