trans-unit.source: The match options are a set of one or more QRegularExpression::MatchOption values. They change the way a specific match of a regular expression against a subject string is done. Please refer to the QRegularExpression::MatchOption enum documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: 匹配选项是一组一个或多个QRegularExpression :: MatchOption值。它们更改了将正则表达式与主题字符串进行特定匹配的方式。请参阅QRegularExpression :: MatchOption枚举文档以获取更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The matching mechanism can vary between managers, but is typically accomplished through an alternative identifier. As part of the save process, the place identifier from the origin manager is saved as an alternative identifier attribute in the destination manager (which can have its own place identifier scheme). In the following example, the origin manager is from the 'here' QGeoServiceProider, therefore as part of the saving process an alternative identifier attribute, x_id_here, is set for the place saved into the destination manager (when QPlaceManager::compatiblePlace() is called)
trans-unit.target: 管理员之间的匹配机制可能有所不同，但通常是通过替代标识符来实现的。作为保存过程的一部分，来自源管理器的位置标识符将另存为目标管理器中的替代标识符属性（可以具有自己的位置标识符方案）。在下面的示例中，源管理器来自“ here” QGeoServiceProider，因此，在保存过程中，将为保存到目标管理器中的位置设置备用标识符属性x_id_here（当调用QPlaceManager :: compatiblePlace（）时） ）

trans-unit.source: The material can import functions from the shader library using the #include directive. Some functionality requires the user to define the constant and structures of the functionality. For example, to use the blendColorLayers function the user must specify the mono_xxx constants and the texture_return and color_layer structure (at least once) before including them in their material.

The material describes how the interior of a geometry in a QSGGeometryNode is filled. It encapsulates an OpenGL shader program and provides ample flexibility in what can be achieved, though most of the Qt Quick items themselves only use very basic materials, such as solid color and texture fills.
trans-unit.target: 该材料描述了如何填充QSGGeometryNode中的几何内部。它封装了OpenGL着色器程序，并提供了足够的灵活性，尽管大多数Qt Quick项目本身仅使用非常基本的材料，例如纯色和纹理填充。

trans-unit.source: The material describes how the interior of a geometry in a QSGGeometryNode is filled. It encapsulates graphics shaders for the vertex and fragment stages of the graphics pipeline and provides ample flexibility in what can be achieved, though most of the Qt Quick items themselves only use very basic materials, such as solid color and texture fills.
The material does not take ownership of the texture.
trans-unit.target: 材料不占质地的所有权。

trans-unit.source: The material of a QSGGeometryNode has changed.
trans-unit.target: QSGGeometryNode的材质已更改。

trans-unit.source: The material specification lets you write custom materials and connect those to the lighting system. Each material must have a fragment shader that implements all the functions the library needs to calculate the shaded color. The material system also offers ready-made functions to help implementing the material. These functions can be accessed by the shader using #include directive with the name of the function.
The material system supports dielectric and transparent materials, point lights, area lights, ambient occlusion, shadowing, two-sided polygons, index-of-refraction, and fragment cutoff (masking).
The matrix in a QSGTransformNode has changed.
trans-unit.target: QSGTransformNode中的矩阵已更改。

trans-unit.source: The maximum transmission unit is the largest packet that may be sent on this interface without incurring link-level fragmentation. Applications may use this value to calculate the size of the payload that will fit an unfragmented UDP datagram. Remember to subtract the sizes of headers used in your communication over the interface, e.g. TCP (20 bytes) or UDP (12), IPv4 (20) or IPv6 (40, absent some form of header compression), when computing how big a payload you can transmit. Also note that the MTU along the full path (the Path MTU) to the destination may be smaller than the interface's MTU.
trans-unit.target: 最大传输单位是指在不引起链路级碎片的情况下,可在此接口上发送的最大数据包。应用程序可以使用这个值来计算适合未分片的UDP数据报的有效载荷大小。在计算您可以传输多大的有效载荷时,请记住减去您在接口上的通信中使用的头的大小,例如TCP(20字节)或UDP(12),IPv4(20)或IPv6(40,没有某种形式的头压缩)。另外要注意的是,沿完整路径到目的地的MTU(路径MTU)可能比接口的MTU小。

trans-unit.source: The meaning of each member of this class is defined by the change type.

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the \w, \d, etc., character classes, as well as the meaning of their counterparts (\W, \D, etc.), is changed from matching ASCII characters only to matching any character with the corresponding Unicode property. For instance, \d is changed to match any character with the Unicode Nd (decimal digit) property; \w to match any character with either the Unicode L (letter) or N (digit) property, plus underscore, and so on. This option corresponds to the /u modifier in Perl regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 所述的含义 \w ， \d 等，字符类，以及它们的对应的含义（ \W ， \D 等），从匹配ASCII字符仅任何字符与相应的Unicode匹配改变属性。例如，更改 \d 以匹配具有Unicode Nd（十进制数字）属性的任何字符； \w 以匹配具有Unicode L（字母）或N（数字）属性以及下划线等的任何字符。此选项对应于Perl正则表达式中的 /u 修饰符。

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the fields is defined in RFC 1035.
trans-unit.target: 字段的含义在RFC 1035中定义。
